metadata.synopsis: Cultists speculating about what is going to happen after Viconia's defeat.

0.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
0.text: All this time, the Mother Superior was unworthy? I don't understand...
0.context: NodeContext: Spoken to self with some confusion/attempting to parse events: a coup has been launched against his one-time leader at the sharran cult. He survived the fight that ensued, but his old leader has been vanquished and a new order is about to assume power.

1.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
1.text: Perhaps I followed her too blindly, if Lady Shar abandoned her.
1.context: NodeContext: Spoken to self with some confusion/attempting to parse events: a coup has been launched against his one-time leader at the sharran cult. He survived the fight that ensued, but his old leader has been vanquished and a new order is about to assume power.

2.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
2.text: At least I still draw breath. Not all can say the same.
2.context: NodeContext: Spoken to self with some confusion/attempting to parse events: a coup has been launched against his one-time leader at the sharran cult. He survived the fight that ensued, but his old leader has been vanquished and a new order is about to assume power.

3.speaker: Sharran Fidelian Gydd
3.text: I always believed she spoke for the Nightsinger. But surely she would have prevailed then?
3.context: NodeContext: Spoken to self with some confusion/attempting to parse events: a coup has been launched against his one-time leader at the sharran cult. He survived the fight that ensued, but his old leader has been vanquished and a new order is about to assume power.
